message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I saw an offer for free bets this week on your site, but I’m not sure if I’m eligible. Can you check for me?
I completely understand your concern. Let’s run through security so I can access your account and check your eligibility. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is Sarah Lewis, my email is sarah.l@example.com, and my date of birth is April 10, 1995.

Thanks, Sarah. That's all correct! I’ve checked your account, and you are eligible for our free bet promotion. To qualify, you need to place a qualifying bet of $20 or more on any sports market with minimum odds of 1.50.
Got it. Once I place the qualifying bet, when will I receive the free bet?
The free bet will be credited to your account within 24 hours after your qualifying bet has been settled. You will receive a notification once it's available for use.
And are there any restrictions on how I can use the free bet?

Yes, the free bet must be used within 7 days from the date it's credited. It can only be used on sports markets with minimum odds of 1.50, and any winnings will be credited as withdrawable funds, excluding the free bet stake.
Thanks for the details! Can I check if there are any other special offers available to me?
Absolutely! You can view all available promotions in the 'Promotions' section of your account. I can also check for any personalized offers available to you right now, if you'd like.
That would be great. Please check for me.
I've checked, and you're also eligible for our 20% cashback promotion on live casino games this week. Would you like more details on how it works?
Yes, please! I'd love to know more.
Great! With the 20% cashback offer, you'll receive 20% back on your net losses from live casino games up to $100. The cashback will be credited as bonus funds with a 10x wagering requirement.
Nice, I'll take advantage of that too. Thanks for your help!
You're very welcome, Sarah! I'm glad I was able to help. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
